name: gmsh

conflicts.name: +metis
conflicts.description: External Metis cannot build with GMSH

variants.name: external
variants.description: Use system versions of contrib libraries, when possible

variants.name: shared
variants.description: Enables the build of shared libraries

variants.name: mpi
variants.description: Builds MPI support for parser and solver

variants.name: fltk
variants.description: Enables the build of the FLTK GUI

variants.name: slepc
variants.description: Build with SLEPc (only when PETSc is enabled)

description:
Gmsh is a free 3D finite element grid generator with a built-in CAD
engine and post-processor. Its design goal is to provide a fast, light
and user-friendly meshing tool with parametric input and advanced
visualization capabilities. Gmsh is built around four modules: geometry,
mesh, solver and post-processing. The specification of any input to
these modules is done either interactively using the graphical user
interface or in ASCII text files using Gmsh's own scripting language.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description: Intel Parallel Studio.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description: Intel Parallel Studio.

dependencies.name: eigen
dependencies.description:
Eigen is a C++ template library for linear algebra matrices, vectors,
numerical solvers, and related algorithms.

dependencies.name: alglib
dependencies.description:
ALGLIB is a cross-platform numerical analysis and data processing
library.

dependencies.name: voropp
dependencies.description:
Voro++ is a open source software library for the computation of the
Voronoi diagram, a widely-used tessellation that has applications in
many scientific fields.

dependencies.name: gmp
dependencies.description:
GMP is a free library for arbitrary precision arithmetic, operating on
signed integers, rational numbers, and floating-point numbers.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: Intel Parallel Studio.

dependencies.name: fltk
dependencies.description:
FLTK (pronounced "fulltick") is a cross-platform C++ GUI toolkit for
UNIX/Linux (X11), Microsoft Windows, and MacOS X. FLTK provides modern
GUI functionality without the bloat and supports 3D graphics via OpenGL
and its built-in GLUT emulation. FLTK is designed to be small and
modular enough to be statically linked, but works fine as a shared
library. FLTK also includes an excellent UI builder called FLUID that
can be used to create applications in minutes.

dependencies.name: gl
dependencies.description:
Mesa is an open-source implementation of the OpenGL specification - a
system for rendering interactive 3D graphics.

dependencies.name: glu
dependencies.description:
Placeholder for external OpenGL utility library (GLU) from hardware
vendors

dependencies.name: cairo
dependencies.description: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: med
dependencies.description: The MED file format is a specialization of the HDF5 standard.

dependencies.name: mmg
dependencies.description:
Mmg is an open source software for simplicial remeshing. It provides 3
applications and 4 libraries: - the mmg2d application and the libmmg2d
library: adaptation and optimization of a two-dimensional triangulation
and generation of a triangulation from a set of points or from given
boundary edges - the mmgs application and the libmmgs library:
adaptation and optimization of a surface triangulation and isovalue
discretization - the mmg3d application and the libmmg3d library:
adaptation and optimization of a tetrahedral mesh and implicit domain
meshing - the libmmg library gathering the libmmg2d, libmmgs and
libmmg3d libraries.

dependencies.name: opencascade
dependencies.description:
Open CASCADE Technology is a software development kit (SDK) intended for
development of applications dealing with 3D CAD data, freely available
in open source. It includes a set of C++ class libraries providing
services for 3D surface and solid modeling, visualization, data exchange
and rapid application development.

dependencies.name: oce
dependencies.description:
Open CASCADE Community Edition: patches/improvements/experiments
contributed by users over the official Open CASCADE library.

dependencies.name: freetype
dependencies.description:
FreeType is a freely available software library to render fonts. It is
written in C, designed to be small, efficient, highly customizable, and
portable while capable of producing high-quality output (glyph images)
of most vector and bitmap font formats.

dependencies.name: petsc
dependencies.description:
PETSc is a suite of data structures and routines for the scalable
(parallel) solution of scientific applications modeled by partial
differential equations.

dependencies.name: slepc
dependencies.description: Scalable Library for Eigenvalue Problem Computations.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: metis
dependencies.description:
METIS is a set of serial programs for partitioning graphs, partitioning
finite element meshes, and producing fill reducing orderings for sparse
matrices. The algorithms implemented in METIS are based on the
multilevel recursive-bisection, multilevel k-way, and multi-constraint
partitioning schemes.

dependencies.name: cgns
dependencies.description:
The CFD General Notation System (CGNS) provides a general, portable, and
extensible standard for the storage and retrieval of computational fluid
dynamics (CFD) analysis data.

dependent_to.name: omega-h
dependent_to.description:
Omega_h is a C++11 library providing data structures and algorithms for
adaptive discretizations. Its specialty is anisotropic triangle and
tetrahedral mesh adaptation. It runs efficiently on most modern HPC
hardware including GPUs.

dependent_to.name: dealii
dependent_to.description:
C++ software library providing well-documented tools to build finite
element codes for a broad variety of PDEs.
